subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
organizations: Bergtraum, Murry, High School for Business Careers
lead_paragraph: The Murry Bergtraum Lady Blazers of Manhattan added to their streak of Public Schools Athletic League basketball titles, and the Boys and Girls High School won its third boys’ title in a row.
snippet: The Murry Bergtraum Lady Blazers of Manhattan added to their streak of Public Schools Athletic League basketball titles, and the Boys and Girls High School won its third boys’ title in a row.
